local_intent: Align for rightward push, execute long push of T-block toward target, then verify near target.
assumptions: Block is visible and within reach
coherence_with_global: Matches transfer phase: align (tolerance 0.005), set yaw 0, perform long push (0.2m at 0 deg, 1500ms), then verify with IsAt(target_marker). Uses same parameters and ordering as GLOBAL_BT semantics.
